ValidationRule.description: This validation will lock the deal-opportunity grouping record if opportunity is pending for approval or closed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> $Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name, OR( Opportunity__r.RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Direct_Record_Type', Opportunity__r.RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Indirect_Record_Type', Opportunity__r.RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Read_Only', Opportunity__r.RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Read_Only_Indirect' ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Phase_Status__c , 'Submitted for G2 Approval'), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Phase_Status__c , 'Submitted for G3 Approval'), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Phase_Status__c , 'Submitted for G4 Approval'), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Phase_Status__c , 'Submitted for G5 Approval'), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Phase_Status__c , 'Submitted for G6 Approval')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Since Opportunity record is Locked, no operations allowed on related Deal-Opportunity Grouping records.
